description:
Course updated on June 2015.

Only %22.7 of crowdfunding campaigns achieves success.

Why is that?

The secret of crowdfunding have been tried to be answered countless times and each of them is different but every one of them is incomplete answers. The reason behind this failure comes from the inability to address everyone's problems in one guide. Crowdfunding Diary solves this problem by implementing “Disruptive Teaching” model.

This course is divided into 6 Sections:

  • Introduction: An overview; learn, what we going to do during the course
  • Part 1 - Plan: How you should plan your campaign start to finish
  • Part 2 - Pre-Launch: How to build a fan base for marketing your campaign after launching
  • Part 3 - Launch: Last controls before the big day.
  • Part 4 - Marketing: How to market your crowdfunding campaign to successfully fund your project.
  • Part 5 - Evaluation and Walk Through: Tracing our steps backwards to evaluate our process and see what we did wrong and what we did right

What's included:

  • 6 Different Sections of Lectures - Ability to solve your crowdfunding problems
  • Upcoming Lectures - Ability to request lectures
  • Interviews - Ability to learn from professionals who have walked this path before
  • Questions and Answers Sessions - Ability to ask your questions instantly
  • Discounts on Tools and Services - Ability to enhance your crowdfunding experience cheaper

Disruptive Teaching Method:

Disruptive teaching is the collaboration of a community to create the lesson together. Every member of the community contributes to teaching and learning experiences. In Crowdfunding Diary, we are going to solve crowdfunding problem together. We are going to try new things, get feedback and solve everyone's problems.

Money back guarantee

This course comes with a no-questions-asked 30-day money back guarantee. If you don't get what you need out of this course, I personally promise you will get your money back.

NOW LETS GET STARTED

Sign up to take the course today.
title: Crowdfunding Diary - Step by Step Walk Through
